name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新 7. 建築防火避難與消防設備8. 給排水衛生化糞設備9. 升降機設備系統10. 智慧型建築概論11. 垃圾處理設備12.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Holiday (No Class)
Week 03: HVAC Fundamentals
Week 04: Cooling Production Equipment and Systems
Week 05: Holiday (No Class)
Week 06: Heating Production Equipment and Systems
Week 07: Piping Equipment and Systems
Week 08: Plumbing Equipment and Systems
Week 09: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Fire protection equipment and systems
Week 11: Introduction to electricity
Week 12: Power equipment and systems
Week 13: Communications, life safety, and security systems
Week 14: Electrical design and wiring
Week 15: Light and lighting
Week 16: Lighting equipment and systems
Week 17: Calculations of Illumination
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Janis, Richard R. and Tao, William, K.Y. (2013). Mechanical and Electrical Systems in Buildings, Fifth Edition, Pearson Prentice Hall.
